thread.title: C. Lokey
thread.title_full: BenQ Direct reviewed by C. Lokey

author: C. Lokey
title: C. Lokey
text: I purchased a refurbished Ht2050 and have about 75 hours on it with no issues. Very impressed so far with it, very minor color adjustments and it looks fantastic. I did my research on many projectors and benq was the favorite over Epson and Optoma. I definitely chose right for my setup. Would buy again for sure.
